description_0: A distant eye-level view of the Excalibur Hotel & Casino. The building is white and resembles an old castle, there are multiple spires at the top of multiple towers that are all connected by the building. The spires are either blue, red, yellow, or green. At the low level of the building on the left side of the image is a green trapezoidal roof structure with a sign attached to the front of it. The large red text of the sign are blocked by black traffic lights attached to a post extending from the left side of the image. There is a long horizontal text bubble below the red text with green text that reads "ITALIAN RESTAURANT". There is an intersection in the foreground with a large number of cars passing through. There is a group of bushes in front of the building on the left side of the image and a row of trees in front of the building on the right side of the image. The sky visible above the spires is clear and blue with no visible cloud coverage.
description_1: A medium-close-up view of decorative bushes placed along a lifted portion of the ground. There are six decorative bushes, all of these bushes are cut to resemble spirals, and in between the bushes are smaller bushes that have been cut into the shape of small rectangles. Along the near side of the view, there is a white staircase that leads down to the bushes. On the left and right sides of the staircase, there are bronze railings. The floor is made up of tiles; along the tiles and towards the center, there are black markings, as well as brown and white ones too; these markings are placed circularly. Most of the area is being lit up by the sun, except for the far right corner of the area. Behind the decorative bushes is a cement railway that is made with extreme detail. It is daytime, and the sun is shining brightly.
